tool_description: Evaluates supplier performance across multiple criteria including delivery, quality, cost, and service to support supplier selection decisions.

supplier_ids.description: List of supplier IDs to evaluate

evaluation_start_date.description: Start date for performance evaluation period

evaluation_end_date.description: End date for performance evaluation period

delivery_weight.description: Weight for delivery performance in overall score (0-1)

quality_weight.description: Weight for quality metrics in overall score (0-1)

cost_weight.description: Weight for cost competitiveness in overall score (0-1)

service_weight.description: Weight for service quality in overall score (0-1)

error_messages: Invalid date range: evaluation_start_date must be before evaluation_end_date.
Weight sum error: All weight parameters must sum to 1.0 (Â±0.01 tolerance).
Invalid weights: All weight parameters must be between 0 and 1.
Insufficient data: At least 5 transactions required per supplier for reliable evaluation.
Supplier not found: One or more supplier IDs do not exist in the system.
usage: Provide supplier IDs and evaluation period. Optionally adjust weights for different performance criteria. The tool analyzes historical performance and generates comprehensive supplier scorecards.

overall_scores.description: Overall performance score (0-100) for each supplier

delivery_scores.description: Delivery performance score for each supplier

quality_scores.description: Quality performance score for each supplier

cost_competitiveness.description: Cost competitiveness score for each supplier

supplier_rankings.description: Ranking of suppliers from best (1) to worst performance
